subject: Re: Novari - platform error
preview: Hi Danielle,We are working on this one in staging and we have made some layout change.Let me know if this works for you and give us a go-ahead to push this one to live

full_threads.body:
Hi Danielle,

We are working on this one in staging and we have made some layout change.
Let me know if this works for you and give us a go-ahead to push this one to live

Hi Joel,

Yes, vendor checklist section-please apply the changes made to the

Danielle Gerlach BUSINESS MANAGER

0437 320 704 | dgerlach@novaricollective.com

03 9580 4102 | Unit 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside VIC 3195

novaricollective.com.au

Hi Danielle,

Just to confirm, I'm assuming it's the "vendor checklist". Please see the attached.

Would you like to have the same editor from "trades" to "Melbourne styling proposal"?

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Thanks Joel,

FYI, this also occurs on the styling platform if the girls copy and paste things into the "Client Checklist" field, which they do from email correspondence on occasion.

Are you able to apply to fix to this too please?

Thank you,

Danielle Gerlach BUSINESS MANAGER

0437 320 704 | dgerlach@novaricollective.com

03 9580 4102 | Unit 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside VIC 3195

novaricollective.com.au

Hi Lucy, 

We were looking for the document that you were coping and pasting from, but Joel picked up that it's an Outlook email. 

Microsoft Outlook, Word etc., can be a bit old school with copy and pasting text. We have now coded in a work around, please watch this quick video to show you how it works:
https://www.loom.com/share/82ba7063d99e4623bb5a1ef06481f2e8

Let me know if you have any questions.

Hi Chris,

Sorry, what document are you after?

I was copying direct from email (Microsoft Outlook) and pasting into the new quoting platform.

I've attached the email if that helps.

Thank you

Lucy McLennan PROJECTS MANAGER, NOVARI PROJECTS

0419 445 024 | lmclennan@novaricollective.com

03 9580 4102 | 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside, VIC, 3195

novaricollective.com.au

Hi Lucy,

We are looking into this. Is it ok to send us the document you are using? so we could use it as a testing doc.

Thanks Chris!

Much appreciated,

Lucy McLennan PROJECTS MANAGER, NOVARI PROJECTS

0419 445 024 | lmclennan@novaricollective.com

03 9580 4102 | 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside, VIC, 3195

novaricollective.com.au

Hi Lucy, 

Thanks for the detailed email.

I have asked Joel to jump on this and we'll report back shortly.

action.text: Chris Paradowski assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Chris,

Nice to speak to you just now as well. As mentioned, there's a couple of glitch's I've found with the quoting platform this morning. I've sent the screen recording straight from Loom to support@wolfiq.com.au to help demonstrate dot point 1 below.


  1. The formatting of the following:
    1.
    2.
    3.
    changes at random when pressing 'delete' or 'enter' buttons




  1. I just prepared a quote, getting through the 'Stylist/Client Details' 'Agent Details' 'Install Details' and filled in the 'Scope of Works'…. Leaving out the price (as still waiting on that).
    I clicked 'Save' down the bottom, which took me back to the main 'Overview' page.


When I re-entered the quote, all details I entered on the first three pages looked the same - which is great.

The Scope Of Works which I entered had random 'n' scattered through the text where there should be nothing, and 'u2013' where I had used a -
This is what came up:



The PDF and the Link are showing the same:



This is what it should have said:


  1. Prep & paint all walls throughout - Natural White.
    1 x Undercoat.
    2 x Topcoats.

  2. Prep & paint all woodwork throughout - Natural White.
    2 x Coats.

  3. Prep & paint ceiling in Kitchen - Natural White.
    1 x Undercoat.
    2 x Topcoats.
    Note: All other ceilings are white and to remain as are.



  1. Prep & paint outside of back door, both sides of fly screen door, doorframe/doorstep & outside of window frame - colour matching to existing.
    2 x Coats.

  2. Supply & install new fly screen to back door.

    Note: If a fourth coat is required over some walls, it will be determined after the third coat. Additional costs will apply if additional coats of paint are required.



I've spoken with Stu in our Sydney office and he said they're experiencing similar glitch's when copying and pasting items into the platform as well.

Thank you,

Lucy McLennan PROJECTS MANAGER, NOVARI PROJECTS

0419 445 024 | lmclennan@novaricollective.com

03 9580 4102 | 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside, VIC, 3195

novaricollective.com.au

Hi Lucy,

Great to speak. The recording tool we recommend is https://www.loom.com/

Can I please ask you to record the error your are experiencing and send back to us in a reply email?
